name: K-Root
description:
K-Root:
Help K-root in his mission to grow and reach his destination but beware of those who want to make it his next lunch. To grow you will need reserves of water and sunlight.

Global Game Jam Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/k-root-0

Controls:

A: Move left
S: Move to the right
D: Move back
W: Move forward
F: Actions (drink water, absorb sunlight)
Mouse: Rotate camera
Esc: Exit

Instructions:

  • Press F to drink water from the puddles. When the water bar is full, press F again to continue walking.
  • If you have water, press F on the holes with sunlight to absorb the light, this will consume your water reserves. Press F again to continue walking.
  • When the carrot meter fills up, K-Root will finally grow into a happy carrot.
  • Beware of carrot predators, they will consume your water reserves and without them K-Root will be vulnerable to predators.
